Preclinical study demonstrate WJMSCs induce differentiate cardiomyocytes endothelial cell integrate vasculature ischemic cardiac tissue , well improve heart function significantly . Therefore , investigator perform double-blind , placebo-controlled trial , randomly assign 160 patient ischemic heart failure secondary myocardial infarction receive intracoronary intravenous infusion WJMSCs placebo , investigate therapeutic safety efficacy WJMSCs patient ischemic cardiomyopathy .
